metadata.description: Official TrayaHealth plugin marketplace for Claude Code extensions

plugins.name: traya-compounding-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered development tools for React and Next.js that get smarter with every use. Make each unit of engineering work easier than the last. Includes 16 specialized agents, 6 commands, and 4 skills.

plugins.name: traya-react-native
plugins.description: AI-powered React Native development workflow with compounding engineering principles. Build high-quality iOS and Android apps with 16 specialized agents, 4 workflow skills, and 6 commands. Includes bundled MCP servers for Figma, iOS Simulator, Android testing, and API integration.
